author: Peta Fuller
title: Schools are open for essential workers – but are you one? Here's what happens for term two
description: Parents around Australia are looking at what's next for their children. So which states want students learning from home, and who can show up to the school gate?
content:
Posted 
April 15, 2020 13:02:01
Coronavirus flipped the start of the school year on its head. From March, some states began closing down in-school education and sending kids to kitchen tables to start learning from home.
Now term two is on its way (and has… [+7153 chars]
